alert.note: Alert for Upper Kobuk and Noatak Valleys (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 22 at 1:57PM AKST until January 25 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow possible. Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches, with localized amounts up to 11 inches, are possible. * WHERE...Upper Kobuk and Noatak Valleys. * WHEN...From late Sunday night through Tuesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 25 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow, sleet or ice accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.
